Contact Details: Email: homelessness_statistics_inbox@gov.scot Lee Bunce: 0131 244 3861 Homelessness Statistics & Analysis Communities Analysis Division 2H-Dockside ,Victoria Quay EH6 6QQ
Description: This bulletin provides information on local authority homelessness applications, assessments and outcomes. It also provides data on the number of households in temporary accommodation, along with the number of households in unsuitable temporary accommodation as defined in the Homeless Persons (Unsuitable Accommodation) (Scotland) Order 2014. The bulletin is based on data collected from local authorities through the HL1 case-level homeless applications data collection along with the HL2 aggregate temporary accommodation summary return and the HL3 case-level temporary accommodation return.
Name: Homelessness in Scotland: Update [date]
Notes: There are two XLS files, one with the most data named tables which contains pure data and the other named charts which seems to be a summary of the tables file data but with charts added.
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified as latest version of Homelessness in Scotland: Update to [date] which is listed in the Statistics column of the table at the top of the page. A link to the data is contained in the links column, named Publication (HTML, PDF, tables and charts). This opens a new page and access to the two XLS files is via supporting files located at the top RHS of the page.
Sizing Notes: Messy structure with quite a few tabs and multiple tables on some tabs. Sub-dimensions and footnotes present.
